short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unified Communications Client for the YOVU office Phones with Click to Dial and Right Click to Call on webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The YOVU Web Dialer for Chrome™ extension provides seamless integration between your YOVU business phone and your Chrome™ browser. The extension expertly recognizes phone numbers within a webpage and automatically converts them to Click-To-Dial links.

The implemented YovuCall feature provides an alternative to Click-To-Dial links, allowing you to dial from a web-page with a simple right-click.
